reviewText: I miss Bernie Mac so much. This makes me feel close to him and makes me feel him near to my heart. This is Hillarious!

Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac

reviewText: Missing Bernie Mac and what he brought to his entertainment projects!! This DVD will have you laughing until your sides hurt. A wonderful tribute to a wonderful comic from the Southside of Chicago. RIP Bernie!
summary: Bernie Mac - "I Ain't Scared of You" - Class Tribute to a "King of Comedy"
Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac

reviewText: I enjoyed this movie because it display Bernie Mac life so well. It is  a great documentary of a great funny man.

reviewText: I haven't watched it yet, but I am sure it is great. I will forever miss seeing Bernie Mac living, but I will always get his movies and standup acts! RIP Mr. Mac! June.

reviewText: This dvd is an amazing tribute to Bernie, it's heartwarming and enjoyable. His daughter and wife speak really well of their life they had with Bernie. He is well missed and his legacy will live on . Fast shipper and will do business again
Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac

reviewText: As only he can, Bernie Mac comes out 'live.'  Mac keeps your attention from the first word.  Hilarious as he was famous for.
Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac

reviewText: I have shared this DVD with several friends and we all agree that Berrie Mac was truly a great man of comedy! Whoever took the time to put this DVD together I offer a hugh thank you for it.  I truly enjoy watching this DVD and so do all my friends!!
summary: Great tribute to a truly gifted performer!!!
Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac

reviewText: This DVD was a poignant tribute to one of the best comedians to ever do it, Bernie Mac. His daughter did an awesome job interviewing his colleagues and also sharing their family's memories about the late, great Mac Man.
Title: I Ain't Scared of You: A Tribute to Bernie Mac
